However, mr Taylor figured he would make a few more changes to them. He looked at the remote and found a setting labelled AGGRESSIVENESS, plus another that was labelled STRENGTH. His gaze immediately shifted over to the 6'5" feet tall mountain of muscle that was Charlotte, and he grinned widely.

Having her become an incredibly strong girl, who could become as angry as a bull, was an interesting concept. He didn't wait long to push the + button for both settings. The remote hummed in his hands, though there were no outward changes. The device had probably changed Charlotte on a level that couldn't be seen, reinforcing her muscles without adding more mass. Of course, he didn't want to fall victim to her heightened aggressiveness, so he increased her loyalty for good measure.

That left only Betty and Anna. The two cheerleaders could use some additional changes as well, and mr Taylor was happy to oblige. For Betty, he increased her intelligence. He turned it up several times, the remote humming in his hands as he did so, and grinned as the previous frown that had been on the redhead's face completely disappeared.

As for her fellow cheerleader, he decided that Anna could use some more good looks. Just like he had done with ms Sparks, he began increasing her beauty. The already gorgeous cheerleader became even more beautiful; her skin shined with the best health possible, and she would be able to turn people's knees into jelly with a single look.

Mr Taylor pondered on what else he could change, and settled with one final option. Last night he had discovered a setting that supposedly changed a person's lewdness. He hadn't thought of using it before, but he decided that if he was going to use it on someone, why not pick the girl that could win a beauty contest with ease?

Once again the remote hummed, though he was done now, and the changes were instantaneous. There weren't any visible changes - at least not that he could see - but he trusted that the remote had done its job; it never seemed to fail him.

The history teacher grinned to himself, nodding in satisfaction at his little modifications to the cheerleaders.

Mr Taylor glanced at the clock, "Alright, time's up. Now the, who can give me the answer for..."
1321211.title: Mr Taylor goes to his classroom

choices: Have some fun with the girls
13212111.content:
Mr Taylor smiled to himself as the lesson ended. The students were already making their way outside, trying to make the most of their short break. He himself didn't have any more lessons to give, which meant that he would be free for the rest of the day.

What better way to spend that time by continuing his plan? These girls weren't going to grow on their own.

As he was about to exit the classroom, mr Taylor heard some sort of commotion in the hallway. He wondered what that could be about. There were some faint mumbles alongside hushed whispering and angry shouting, causing his teacher instincts to kick in. Apparently there was a fight he had to break up...again...

The man was only one step outside before he saw one of the students get slammed against a locker. The metal groaned - as did the boy - and Jacob was fairly certain that there was a dent in the container. The student was one of the seniors; Thomas Oliver, if he remembered him correctly.

Mr Taylor was about to call out his assailant, but then he noticed who had lifted the 150 or so pounds senior, and he was surprised to see Charlotte being responsible. The dark-skinned amazon was glaring fiercely at the boy, holding him up against the locker as if he weighed nothing more than a sack of grapes to her.

Well, considering he had augmented her muscles to bodybuilder status and increased her strength in addition to that, that was probably the case. Her large biceps certainly agreed with him, seeing as they bulged and the veins pulsed angrily.

"What the fuck did you say to me, you piece of fucking filth?!" Charlotte practically roared in Thomas' face, her pretty features twisted in rage.

The senior squirmed in her grasp, "Please, just let me go."

"I don't think so. Betty, what did he say?" Charlotte said, addressing her friend who stood behind her.

"His exact words were 'man, that chick looks like some sort of freaky hulk'. Tch, so uncivilized." The girl placed her hands on her wide hips; the ripped muscles in her arms tensed. She shook her head and spoke a refined manner, "Then again, what to expect from such an inferior specimen?"

"Not everyone is smart enough to get noticed by almost every top university in the country like you, Betty." Anna giggled, her muscular arms crossed beneath her large bosom.

The students around the raven-haired girl almost fainted upon hearing her voice. It was sultry, sexy and oozed sensuality to an almost hypnotic degree. Her voice was as beautiful as the rest of her, and when combined with her appearance of a beauty goddess she could probably make others do whatever she said; just to get her attention.

The three muscular cheerleaders stood out among their fellow students, but mr Taylor figured that was only normal. After all, he was the one who had changed them through unnatural means in the first place.

"I didn't mean it!" The captive boy pleaded in a desperate attempt to save himself.

However, that only pissed off Charlotte even further, "Shut up!"

One of her ebony hands suddenly shot out, grasping the boy's shoulder. She grinned evilly before applying a tiny amount of force. Of course, what was a small amount of force for her was devastating for Thomas, who cried out in pain. The muscular limb flexed in a way that caused mr Taylor to shiver in delight; her meaty forearm bulged, while the veins were pushed further away by the expanding muscle cords.

"Ah!" Thomas shouted, accompanied by an audible crack.

No one missed how his bones had cracked under the sheer pressure of Charlotte's might. The tall amazon's strength was immense, and that fact was only further established by how she had managed to break his bones with just a single hand.

But to all good things must come an end. As much as he liked seeing the augmented super-girl break people with her bare hands, Jacob knew he had to step in.

"That's enough! Charlotte, please put him down." He said, hoping that the remote had made sure she wouldn't turn all of that aggressiveness on him.

The hands that held Thomas opened less than a second later. The young man fell on the ground, crying out in pain from the impact and his bruised shoulder. Charlotte immediately turned to look at him, which was a bit weird since she was now taller than him, as well as much wider with all of that muscle mass. Her face was set in surprise, but also adoration.

"Mr T! I'm so sorry. I didn't know you were here. is there anything else I can do for you?" She told him with a look that looked akin to an eager puppy.

"No, Charlotte, but I'm happy to hear that you're sorry." He knew damn well that she wasn't sorry about the boy, but he had to keep up appearances. He looked over to Thomas, "Get to the nurse's office, mr Oliver. Hurry up and get that shoulder checked out. As for the rest of you, get to your next lessons."

Thomas left immediately as did a number of students, but a lot of them seemed to be rooted in place. Jacob sighed in annoyance. Why wasn't he surprised that they would ignore him and stay instead?

Charlotte seemed to notice his frustration, because she immediately glared at everyone present, "Get moving or you're all next!"

That got them scurrying away like frightened animals. The hallway was practically abandoned in less than a minute; no one wanted to mess with Charlotte. The dark-skinned mountain of muscle and strength looked back to him, her gaze expectant as if she hoped that had earned his approval.

"Thank you for the help, Charlotte."

"Anything for you, mr T." Charlotte grinned shyly, which looked out of place on the over 200 pounds-weighing cheerleader. "Just ask me and I'll do anything you want. Anything."

"Really? Would you beat someone up for me? Even your parents?" Jacob asked curiously.

She quickly nodded, "Of course! Mr T, I'd even beat them in a coma or kill them for you, as long as it pleases you."

Alright, that confirmed his expectations. The girl was loyal to the bone. Not only had the remote changed her mind so she would love him and be more aggressive, but she seemed to be willing to carry out any order of his. Hell, the fact that she was willing to kill told him enough.

"While that's a bit extreme, I appreciate the sentiment." He grinned, seeing the girl beam at the response. He turned to the other girls, "And you two?"

Anna smiled sweetly, "Of course we'd do anything for you too, mr T. In fact, don't hesitate to come to me if you're feeling pent-up." She added a wink at the end.

He could feel his throat go dry as she brought her hands up to her bosom and groped it, kneading the two large firm orbs of flesh that were hidden by her tight shirt. The squeezed together and he could see some of her cleavage spill out.

Betty nodded, "Like my friends told you, I'm willing to help you out in any way, mr T. Don't worry about Charlotte killing anyone either. If it happens I'll be able to take care of the body and any legal matters, seeing as I know everything that there is to know about criminology and the law."

"Really?" Jacob blinked in surprise, "When did you learn this?"

"Oh, a few weeks back. I was bored and decided to learn something new, but I managed to fully learn the material in less than two weeks."

That was... well, he'd say it was impossible, but the remote had made her very smart so he could accept that response. This was great! The girls' loyalty would help him out in the future; someone like Charlotte was an excellent bodyguard.

"I'm glad to hear that you're also so loyal to me. Seriously, I couldn't have wished for more." Mr Taylor grinned impishly, patting the remote in his pocket.
13212111.title: The lesson ends

132121112.content:
Mr Taylor bid the girls goodbye as they headed off to their next lessons. There were no more lessons for him to give for the day, which meant he had ample time to continue with his plan. After all, these girls didn't grow by themselves.

Still, it had been amusing to watch the cheerleader's reactions when he had complimented them. Each girl had had a different reaction to his praise. Betty accepted it with a pleased smile and an air of grace, along with a hint of intellectual superiority. Anna had grinned widely, placing a hand on a wide hip and pushing up her large chest. Charlotte had looked as if her god had graced her with his presence; an exciting prospect if he had to be honest.

One thing was for certain; the girls were completely loyal to him, which would prove to be most useful. He could always use some muscle - pun not intended.

Jacob pondered on what his next move would be. He already had a few followers among the students, so perhaps getting the staff in his side would be a good move. Ms Sparks was only one teacher out of a dozen. Perhaps he could even become the principal of the school with the help of the remote! That would give him more power, as well as more opportunities.

The history teacher slowed down his pace as he neared the staff room. He could already hear murmurs from inside, as was often the case. However, mr Taylor noticed that the room was actually quite empty upon entering.

It was a spacious room, and while some students liked to gossip, it was in fact nicely decorated. There were a few plants, the walls were colored a soft green and blue, and a large table was set in the middle where the teachers could gather around.

Most of the seats were empty at the moment though. It was only normal; other teachers still had lessons to give, even if he was free now. Aside from himself, there were mr Eckelstone, miss Scarletina and mr Garcia.

The first was an old man who was getting close to being demented, but he was pretty popular and would retire next year anyway. Jacob got along well with him, but the withered old man kept shout 'deer' at the most random times...it was a bit disturbing. Eckelstone was sat in his own seat, snoring softly as he had his umpteenth nap of the day.

Then there was Anastasia Scarlatina. Honestly, mr Taylor didn't know whether to be in awe or afraid of her. The woman was quite beautiful and had pronounced womanly curves that were emphasized by the business-like suit that she often wore. Her green eyes were like emeralds, though they were stern and sometimes cold behind her glasses. Her long red hair was tied up in a bun that suited her.

"Well, well... if it isn't little Jacob." Came a mocking voice.

And of course, there was Antonio Garcia... The man was the poster boy of those Latino romance films. He was tall, muscular, had bronze skin and looked like an Adonis. Jacob often wondered about how much time the bastard spent in the bathroom in the morning to fix that dark hair of his. There was so much gel in it that it hurt his eyes.

And yes, Antonio was a complete bastard. He didn't know what he had done to become the Adonis' favorite target, but he was always picked on by his colleague for being less attractive and smaller. So what if he didn't have such a muscular chest or such great cheekbones?

"Antonio, what a pleasure to see you again." Mr Taylor responded flatly, eyes dull as he stared at the taller man.

The bronze-skinned man grinned, "Oh, I know it is. Still, it's good to see you too. And here I was, thinking you might have accidentally gone over to the pre-school, being so small."

Oh, that bastard of a Spanish teacher... Jacob wanted nothing more than to wrap his hands around the idiot's throat and choke him. Alas, there was probably a rule against that. Such a shame.

He sat down on his own seat, but not before accepting the mug of coffee from miss Scarlatina. He gratefully accepted the drink and thanked her, receiving a curt nod in response. Anastasia was a distant woman, but they had gotten along for more than five years now; saying they were friends would be much, but they weren't exactly acquaintances either.

"Antonio, is it really necessary to rile him up like that?" The math teacher gave her colleague a pointed look.

"Come now, it was nothing but some banter between friends." Oh, fuck off and die in a pit. "Besides, he's smaller than both of us, so I'm not lying. I can't be blamed for having such good genes to be tall and handsome."

The room was silent as its occupants tried to process the giant ego that was among them. A loud snore from mr Eckelstone proved that he was lucky enough to be saved from having to suffer Antonio's boasting.

Now that was unfair; both he and miss Scarlatina were taller than him - he didn't disagree - but he was of average height. His female colleague was 6'2" tall, while the damn idiot was 6'4". Jacob knew that his 'friend' wouldn't be so confident if someone else was taller than him...

Wait a second.

Mr Taylor glanced at miss Scarlatina, who was getting increasingly annoyed by Antonio's behavior. He could see it in how her green eyes narrowed. His hand drifted over to the remote, knowing just what to do.

Oh yes, revenge would be so sweet.

Jacob took out the remote and held it under the table. By now he knew which buttons to press, so it was only a matter of pushing a tiny bit. A vicious grin formed on his face as he did so.

The remote - being the faithful companion that it was - quickly fulfilled his wishes, using it's unnatural powers to transform ms Scarlatina. The redhead inched higher and higher, growing taller in a matter of moments; now an astounding 6'9" feet. She was standing even taller than ms Sparks!

However, the best changes happened to her muscles. The remote easily added over a hundred pounds of raw muscle mass. Anastasia's suit had to be adjusted by the reality-altering powers of the device, because her chest alone became as wide as a barrel. Her pectoral muscles jutted outwards by a few good inches, and her obliques formed two ladders of sculpted muscles on her sides. Combined with her widening hips, the math teacher now possessed an amazing hourglass figure that put most models to shame; especially with how her short skirt barely kept up with her expanded butt. Her glutes had swollen so much, adding more muscle to each, that the redhead's ass took up all space of her seat - and then even more!

Jacob had to admit that his colleague had some stunning legs. They looked amazing in her stockings; long and smooth, yet muscular enough to give professional bodybuilders a run for their money now. Anastasia's hamstrings were like ropes made of steel, while her quads were carved out of marble. The stockings-clad calves down below were large and meaty, with some thick veins dotting her soft skin. They were just bristling with power!

The math teacher's arms beefed up considerably; large biceps with immense definition formed on her limbs, probably measuring at least 22 inches. Clearly her legs had triumphed over her arms, but they were no less impressive. In fact, they were only a few inches smaller than Charlotte's, but definitely nowhere ms Sparks' league. Her back morphed into a valley of muscle cords, with her traps resembling wings. Speaking of valleys, ms Scarlatina's breasts swelled larger and larger until her suit almost broke down against the strain of her larger, firmer orbs.

Jacob didn't stop there, of course. There were still mental changes to be done. He quickly increased her love and loyalty, like he had done before with the other girls, but this time he made sure she would be protective of him. It amused him to think that the teacher, who was famous for being the coldest and strictest in the whole school, would be the complete opposite for him alone.

The remote powered down upon finishing the transformation. Its owner grinned as ms Scarlatina suddenly glared at her colleague, causing said man to gulp.

"You know what? I believe you owe Jacob an apology, Antonio." She almost sneered as she said the man's name, eyes cold and unforgiving. "It would be in your best interest to give one."

The tanned man chuckled nervously, "Come now, Anastasia. It's just a little joke."

That did little to calm the amazon-sized woman down. In fact, her eyes narrowed in response, sending chills down even Jacob's own spine. She stood up from her seat, showing off just how tall she was as she towered over them, before walking over to mr Garcia.

Anastasia scowled as placed her hands on her hips, pushing out her glorious chest; her whole upper body seemed to block out the light. The teacher that looked on from below gulped loudly.

"You will cease to make fun of mr Taylor, or I will personally shut that mouth of yours." Ms Scarlatina said coldly. She pushed up one of her legs, placing a delicate hand on a pillar of stockings-clad muscle. "Do you see the sheer muscle mass that I have in one leg? Imagine if I were to put that pretty face of yours between both of them. Make no mistake, mr Garcia - I can most definitely crush you with a simple squeeze. Do as I say, and you will avoid this fate. Understood?"

The man nodded weakly, eyes wide and breathing labored. A drop of sweat slid down his face. Ms Scarlatina's eyes shone with cold delight.

"Good, now get out of my sight before I break you." She ordered, leaving him no choice in the matter.

Jacob watched in obvious glee as his bully almost stormed over to the door, forgetting his coat in the process. Oh, that was so worth it.

"Thank you, ms Scarlatina." He finally spoke up.

The red-haired amazon smiled shyly, "Please, call me Anastasia. And it was my pleasure, sir."

Yup, definitely worth it.

At that moment, ms Sparks made her debut as she walked into the teacher's lounge. Judging by the time, she was free as well, having just finished her own lessons. Any traces of hostility seized at that moment. Instead, ms Sparks and ms Scarlatina both blushed fiercely, smiling happily to be praised by the man they considered as their alpha.

Come to think of it, that was what he wanted to be, right? He had two goals; turn every girl in this school into a muscular amazon, and be their leader with all the perks that came with the title.

Jacob sighed as he leaned back in his seat. While that was indeed what he wanted, getting it done was a different story altogether. He could hardly just go around the school, zapping girls with the remote until he finally had his school of amazons.

Mr Taylor looked around a bit, seeing as his top two amazons had decided to correct some tests in their spare time. As he did so, he noticed a stack of books on the table. He grabbed the one on top, and saw that it was the yearbook.

The history teacher turned the first page, scanning the yearbook for anything interesting. The pages were filled with photos of the students, divided by gender and year, and he recognized a few of them.

He chuckled as he saw Charlotte, Anna and Betty. The tall, dark-skinned mountain of muscle was scowling at the camera, hinting at an aggressive nature that was contained within those huge muscles. Anna was looking sultrily at the camera, her eyes hypnotizing him even through the picture. As for Betty, she held herself with a grace of intellectual superiority.

There were many other girls, all of them of various ethnics, looks, bodytypes, etc. Jacob grinned as he imagined them all growing bigger, becoming more beautiful and seeing him as their master.

Wait, what if he used the remote on the book, zapping the pictures of every woman - be it teacher or student - in the book?

He hadn't tested this before; maybe he could change things through indirect means, like through a television or picture! The remote seemed to be capable of almost everything, so why not try it out? It wasn't like he was going to lose anything if it failed. If anything, he only stood to gain!

Jacob brought up the remote and began his work. He made sure to zap only the female section of the book, using the MUSCLE function as well as the LOVE function, turning all of the women in his lovable amazons who would follow his every command.

By the time he was done, the bell rang signaling lunch break. Mr Taylor leaned back in his seat, sighing as he tried to ignore the cramp in his hand from using the remote. Still, he had to see if it had actually worked or not.

"Would you like to eat with me, darling?" Ms Sparks asked him, biting her lower lip as she looked softly at him with absolute devotion.

"With both of us." Ms Scarlatina interjected, narrowing her beautiful eyes behind her glasses.

Jacob shook his head, "Another time, perhaps. I'd like to take a walk."

The two women easily complied, taking in his answer without any issues. Mr Taylor got up from his seat and walked over to the door, exiting the teacher's lounge. At least those two were complete successes. Now, he just had to see if his little experiment had produced any results.

As he entered the hallway, he wasn't surprised to see that it was bustling with activity. Some students were still coming out of their classrooms, while others were already leaving for the canteen or tended to their own business; the usual thing.

What did stop him in his tracks were the abrupt changes.

All the female students had turned into muscular amazons, regardless of which grade they were in. He almost stumbled in shock as he saw their new physiques.

Gone were the average student bodies, including the skinny and overweight ones; they had made way for rippling muscle. From freshman to senior, each girl had their clothing plastered to their new muscles, even if they thought they had always been this way.

Mr Taylor's eyes were glued to the legs of the girls that passed him by, taking in how big their thighs were. The girls' quads and hamstrings looked like they had been chiseled out of marble, big and defined, plus around the size of bodybuilders. Their snug jeans and tantalizing skirts accentuated their muscular thighs, the former clinging to their form as the latter showed off every bit of striated skin.

He saw 14-years-old girls with biceps bigger than the senior boys, and the senior girls themselves looked like they belonged in bodybuilding competitions. Jacob spotted two juniors discussing better workout techniques with a senior, who happily showed off her biceps by striking a double bicep pose. The student's massive arms bulged with muscle, forearms thickening and biceps going higher and higher to form that amazing peak of muscular dominance.

He could hear snippets of conversation from the students in the hallway.

"Stacy, how do you manage to get your abs in such shape? They're like bricks, but so good-looking!"

"Did you hear? One of the senior girls managed to outlift her entire family, despite her uncle being a professional bodybuilder."

"The juniors this year are doing well with their workouts. If they keep up with Ms Sparks' training regimen like we did, they'll be stronger than their dads in less than a month."

"Wow! Your legs are 32 inches already?"

"I don't know, maybe I should work a bit more on my calves? I mean, it's already difficult to wear any boots due to their size, but I don't want them to be too small, you know?"

"Look, it's the cheerleader trio! Man, they're so lucky to be the biggest students and to have mr Taylor's attention."

Mr Taylor blinked at the mention of three familiar girls. He looked around, hoping to see them, and found them at the end of the hallway. It wasn't hard to miss them - it was impossible to - and he felt his mouth open in surprise, staring as the students made way for them.

Betty, Anna and Charlotte walked through the school as if they owned it, their over 200 lbs bodies packed with dense, sexy muscle mass. They were gaining a lot, and almost ms Sparks' level.

He loved the remote.

Luke smiled to himself as he entered his class room. Today he would test the remote on one of his fellow students, experimenting on them as he pleased. There were a few interesting ones, such as physical and mental altering choices, and he couldn't wait to try them all out.

Everyone was slowly getting to their seats, prompting Luke to do the same. He sat down behind his desk and quickly deposited his backpack next to his chair. However, he suddenly heard some whispering behind him, which piqued his interest. Luke leaned back as he listened to two students that sat in the row after his.

"Look, it's plain Betty." One of the boys snickered.

"Man, she really is a nerd isn't she? I've heard she's so plain, her older sister avoids her like the plague because she doesn't want to be associated with someone like her."

"Ha! You can't blame her for not wanting to have anything to do with that nerd!"

Her blonde hair was plain, she wasn't really ugly nor beautiful, she wasn't short or tall, had a decent mind, but was pretty average in general. It was the perfect opportunity to test the device out, and Luke didn't hesitate in doing so. He pointed it at Betty, who was looking at the equations with a deep frown as if she was confused, as he searched for the right setting.

"Yes, Betty?" He asked her, sounding like he expected a question about the math.

"Sir, with all due respect, but I believe you've made a mistake."

Everyone gaped at her in surprise. Everyone except Luke, that is. He already knew what the man had done wrong. However, he was quite interested in how this was going to play out. If the teacher's expression was any indication, then it would be a riot for him.

"I'm certain that my equations are correct, Betty." The math teacher frowned. "I've been doing this for seven years, while this is the first time you've seen these equations."

Everyone began chuckling at the man's sass, though it wasn't his intention, but Betty remained impassive. In fact, she seemed more confident than before.

Betty shook her head, "But sir, you've misplaced one of the numbers and you should have..."

She went into a full explanation of everything that was wrong with his work, not leaving a single detail out of her lengthy speech, as she corrected her own teacher. To say that her fellow classmates were astonished would be an understatement. Even the math teacher himself seemed shocked by her knowledge about the subject, which proved her increased intelligence. Luke was loving every second of it.

"I, ah, see." The teacher coughed uncomfortably to clear his throat, trying to regain a sense of credibility in front of his students. "Well done, Betty. Now as I was saying..."

Luke ignored his rant about the new teaching material, preferring to keep his eyes on Betty. The remote had definitely done its job. Luke quickly increased her overall sex appeal. If he was going to have the perfect girlfriend, then she needed the looks. Her skin was rid of any blemish, while her eyes shined with a dazzling intensity. Her lips became plump and inviting. Within seconds she had gained the beauty of a pro model.

1441.content:
Luke had to dash past numerous students to catch up to Betty, who was already at the end of the hallway by now. Some of the teenagers shot him nasty glares as he ran past them. Everyone thought he was rude and egocentric, which might have been technically correct, but Luke hardly cared for their opinions. If they didn't like him running past them, then they should have gotten out of the way. Those dumb apes were hardly worthy of his empathy.

The glasses-wearing boy managed to find Betty close to their lockers. Apparently she was picking up a few books, her new height allowing her to retrieve them with more ease. Luke caught glimpses of the material that she had stored away in her locker. Forces of Nature, Scale: The Universal Laws of Growth, Innovation, Sustainability, and the Pace of Life in Organisms, Cities, Economies, and Companies, Elements of Mathematics. These were just a few of the intellectual books that her new IQ allowed her to understand.

However, Luke's attention was quickly snatched away by the small group that approached his first test subject. How could he not recognize them? At the front of the group stood Rachel Parker, the school's cheerleader captain. The girl was certainly worthy of the position. Rachel was beautiful, popular and good at what she did. Her entire entourage seemed to consist out of fellow cheerleaders.

Luke knew Rachel was quite attractive, but there was one major thing that made her completely incompatible with him, namely her dumb mind. Rachel was the kind of girl that was too stupid to get her grades without the help of people like him. She either tricked nerds and geeks to help her in passing her tests, which was something that Luke himself had done for her before, or used her parents' money. Her stunning black hair, confident green eyes and curvy body could only get her so far.

In the end, Rachel was nothing when compared to Betty, who was now the cheerleader's equal in looks and superior in intelligence.

"Hey, you're the one they call Betty, right?" Rachel could be heard asking, as Luke sneaked closer to listen in on their conversation.

Betty turned to face her, "That is indeed my name. How may I help you?"

"Look, I've been listening to some of my BFFs, who heard from a bunch of guys that there's apparently this girl who has quite the looks and could be part of our social group." Rachel smirked, her voice sounding pompous and confident. "Of course, I was like 'whatever', but now that I've seen you, I think we can arrange something. So what do you say? Wanna hang out with us cheerleaders and ditch the losers?"

The first impression that Luke got from her was one that caused him to get nauseous. Her lack of intellect was as clear as day, and were it not for her gorgeous features he would have vomited. This school of neanderthals definitely needed better standards.

Betty seemed to share his opinion from what he could see. The attractive blonde raised a perfect eyebrow at the cheerleader captain, unimpressed by the offer.

"While your proposition of rising the so-called social ladder is to a certain extent flattering, I'm afraid that it is not in my interest to interact with those who do not have the necessary intellectual capacity to mentally stimulate me." She replied offhandedly.

The dumbfounded looks on the girls caused Luke to snicker. He had to contain himself and place his hand over his mouth, lest he wanted to give away his position. It appeared that Betty had gained quite the confidence boost thanks to her new body and IQ.

"Excuse me?" Rachel blinked in confusion.

Betty sighed, "I'm not interested because you're boring."

"How dare you!" The cheerleader growled in outrage.

"Yeah! Who do you think you are?" One of Rachel's minions called out, accompanied by murmurs of agreement that came from the whole entourage.

"My name is Betty Johnson. I am the captain of the school's algebra team, chess team and four year long reigning champion of the annual spelling bee." Betty deadpanned, crossing her toned arms over her ample bust, clearly not scared of the cheerleaders. "While I'll probably go to Harvard, you lot will waste away your lives by focusing on insignificant topics such as fashion or the latest celebrity crush."

Their shocked expressions were priceless. Luke felt satisfied as he watched Rachel drop her jaw, glad to have some sort of revenge on one of the many people that had wronged him.

Rachel could only glare at the smarter girl, "Yeah? Well, uh, at least we're more popular than you! I mean, just look at you. Is it really a surprise that you're still single?"

Luke decided that this was probably the best moment to make his next change. He quickly grabbed the remote and aimed it at Betty, adjusting her mental state. Within the blink of an eye she possessed feelings for the shorter boy. Luke made sure that she would be completely loyal to him, her heart now belonging to him and him alone, regardless of his personality.

He stepped out of the shadows and approached the girls, smiling smugly as he saw them notice his arrival. His smugness increased exponentially as Betty gave him a loving smile. Her eyes were solely focused on him. As for Rachel, she scowled at him in cold disgust.

"Hello, dear." Betty said affectionately, her cheeks taking on a rosy color.

"Hi, Betty." Luke grinned and stood close to her.

He placed his arm around her narrow waist, letting his hand rest on her hip. Betty didn't push him away. If anything, she almost purred at the close proximity. Luke grinned knowingly. The remote had turned her into his mate, one that was completely devoted to him, while being his image of a perfect girlfriend.

"Oh my god, you're with that perverted loser?" Rachel sneered. "I can't believe I actually thought you would fit in our group. Ugh, can you get any more ugly?"

Luke smirked, holding the remote behind his back. By now he had memorized the buttons on the device thanks to his superior intellect. He decided that it was about time to teach Rachel a lesson, one that she wouldn't forget soon.

He activated the remote and watched excitedly as Betty changed again. Her beauty had increased immensely since last time, but this time it went even further than that. Her hair became perfect. It was so lustrous and magnificent that Betty didn't even need to take care of it, seeing as it was naturally perfect. Every barber in the world would give their souls to get the chance to work on her golden locks. Betty's face alone was enough to arouse both man and woman. Her smooth facial features couldn't be captured by even the best painters in humanity's history, since it would only diminish her superb beauty. Flawless skin seemed to glow in the light. Men would swoon before her, women would scowl with envy and models would cry knowing that achieving Betty's goddess-like appearance was nigh impossible.

Betty's curves became almost ridiculously perfect. Her full breasts gained another cup-size, now resembling grapefruits of firm womanly curves. The smart girl's ass expanded as well, becoming rounder and wider as her hips gained an inch or two. Betty's body was now a work of art, the very dream of perverts, capable of hypnotizing them with just a simple pose. Her shirt and shorts could barely contain her massive bust and pear-shaped behind.

"Actually, I think you're the ugly duckling when compared to her." Luke chuckled.

Rachel's face flushed red with indignation, but she couldn't find any comebacks. Eventually she just stormed away with her cheerleader companions in tow. Luke's pride skyrocketed as Betty hugged him closely, allowing him to feel her amazing body. He could feel her ample breasts and noticeable nipples rub against his torso.

"Thanks for defending me like that, dear." Betty said happily, her angelic voice almost driving him over the edge.

"No thanks needed, believe me" Luke grinned.

info.brief_description: A Magic Remote that can do nearly any transformation you can think of.
info.description:
I'm happy to announce that I and some friends have set up a new discord server for Beautification, Giantess, Breast expansion, Goddesses, and general shitposting. These among other things are to both get feedback, as well as allow everyone to share these kinds of content as well as hang out. It will also be a place I talk about my stories, and we can share stories pics etc.)

Link to the discord: https://discord.gg/vdwt6xu

My DA: https://www.deviantart.com/han216/


While there are many transformation stories of various genres, I thought I'd make one that could be more expansive in selection.

A person of your choosing finds a magic remote with numerous buttons all over it (I will add several to start, but feel free to add your own. One need only press the button which represents some trait, then press the up or down switch. Example: Size button then + grows, - shrinks. The person can transform others. The remote can only transform who it's pointing at. The remote will grow or shrink with the size of the person. Note: Don't feel the need to explain it out in detail, I've done a few story chapters now and realize it's tedious to do so.

What I want in the story-

-Giantess of any size and I mean any size, just try to build up the story no normal size to universal in a couple chapters. Shrinking is fine.

- Any form of Expansion, Breast, Butt, Futanari, Muscle, etc.

- Vore of any kind is fine.

- Miscellaneous changes, one of the main reasons I wanted to add this story. Such as strength increases without muscle, Hair growth, Sluttiness, changes to a girl's voice to make it sexier or other possible changes to voice louder, or more persuasive. Increased Horniness, orgasm intensity, or cum output (not just for Futa). There is an Orgasm button which can make the person cum instantly, please use responsibly or don't it's fun either way.

- Just try to keep the change in it's story, though mixing is fine just make sure if you're adding to a line someone else has been doing it's alright with them. In other words your giantess with disproportionate proportions who grows through vore is fine, just don't jump to that when someone is doing just a vanilla giantess growth story without their permission.

-I want these transformations to go to extremes in a lot of cases- don't let that discourage you from adding anything small, even just one chapter

- The remote has options to weather the change alters people to think the change was always that way, and in the case of the expansion options weather the expansion effects their movement.

- If you want to kill off the original main character or give the remote to someone else, it's okay just make sure that character stays alive in a story line as someone may want them.

- If you have other suggestions I'm open to more just inform me before hand.

What I don't want-

As I'm allowing a lot this shouldn't be to hard to follow

- No Male focused transformation. They can transform, and do the changes, but I don't want them to be the focus of the changes. They can become females though with the femininity button +.

- No Toilet stuff (Poop, Piss, gas, etc.)

- Any furry stuff must pass my approval, I will tolerate you, but if it seems to be going to far or going into bestiality it's not allowed.

- Weight gain by the device, Overeating and vore especially are okay just no push a button gain 100 lbs of fat.

- Leave options open for other transformations of that kind. In other words if a character picks size make sure to leave options if it's the last one option on that chapter.

- Don't write short chapters, If you need more options okay, but otherwise try to make them over 1000 characters can be shorter, but quality is what I want, so move a story forward.


-------Finally If you have any questions or want me go in a certain direction just email me here, I check most days. If you want to join in feel free.
